All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddTeamsToLeagueView
View that shows the user a checkBox to select the teams they want to add to a league
AdminMainView
View that shows the admin three buttons: TEAMS, LEAGUES, STATISTICS
BaseView
Base view that contains the back arrow, the settings button and the liveStreaming.
ConfigJSONDAO
 
ConnectionUtil
 
CreatedPlayersView
View that shows the admin a list of the created players after uploading the JSON file.
CreateLeagueView
View that prompts the user to introduce the name of the league to be created.
DatabaseConfig
 
DeleteLeagueView
View that shows the admin a checkBox where he/she can select the leagues to delete.
DeleteTeamView
View that shows the admin a checkBox where he/she can select the teams to delete.
League
The League class represents a sports league.
LeagueController
League Controller handles the actions and events related to league operations.
LeagueDAO
 
LeagueInterface
The LeagueInterface provides methods for managing leagues and teams.
LeagueManager
 
LeagueSQLDAO
The LeagueSQLDAO class is responsible for performing CRUD operations for League objects in a SQL database.
LeagueView
View that shows the admin a list of the created leagues.
ListPlayersView
View that list the players that a Team has in a JTable.
ListTeamsView
View that list the teams that a League has in a JTable.
LogInController
The Log In Controller class handles the actions and events related to the Log In view.
LogInView
View that allows the user to log in.
Main
 
MainController
The MainController class handles the actions and events mainly related to the change of the card layout.
MainWindow
Main view that contains a CardLayout to change from Login to the other Views
Match
 
MatchDAO
The MatchDAO interface provides methods to access and manipulate Match objects in the data storage.
MatchInterface
 
MatchManager
The MatchManager class handles the management and simulation of matches.
MatchSQLDAO
 
PlayerDAO
 
PlayerMainView
View that shows the admin a list of the created leagues.
PlayerSQLDAO
The PlayerSQLDAO class implements the PlayerDAO interface to provide access to User objects stored in a SQL database.
Statistics
The Statistics class represents the statistics of a team within a league.
StatisticsView
View that shows a chart representing all the statistics.
Team
The Team class represents a sports team.
TeamController
The TeamController class handles the actions and events related to team operations.
TeamDAO
The TeamDAO interface provides methods for accessing and manipulating team data in the data storage.
TeamInterface
 
TeamManager
 
TeamSQLDAO
 
TeamView
View that shows a list of the Teams together with 2 buttons: CREATE TEAM and DELETE TEAM.
User
The User class represents a user/player in the system.
UserInterface
 
UserManager
